name: WinScrollRight
parameters: row as uByte, col as uByte, width as Ubyte, height as Ubyte
doc:
sub fastcall WinScrollRight

scrolls the window defined by (row, col, width, height) 1 cell right

name: WinScrollLeft
parameters: row as uByte, col as uByte, width as Ubyte, height as Ubyte
doc:
sub fastcall WinScrollLeft

scrolls the window defined by (row, col, width, height) 1 cell left

name: WinScrollUp
parameters: row as uByte, col as uByte, width as Ubyte, height as Ubyte
doc:
sub fastcall WinScrollUp

scrolls the window defined by (row, col, width, height) 1 cell up

name: WinScrollDown
parameters: row as uByte, col as uByte, width as Ubyte, height as Ubyte
doc:
sub fastcall WinScrollDown

scrolls the window defined by (row, col, width, height) 1 cell down
